headline: Ameren : *MEDIA ADVISORY* Ameren Illinois to host open house in Decatur to preview electric grid plan
summary: Ameren Illinois is hosting an open house on Thursday, June 12 in Decatur to share the company's plans to improve energy service reliability and prepare for an equitable transition to clean energy. The...
